org.smartregister.child.activity

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • MultiLanguageActivity
      • org.smartregister.child.activity.BaseActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChildRegisterContract.InteractorCallBack
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseChildActivity

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends MultiLanguageActivity
implements ChildRegisterContract.InteractorCallBack
    Base activity class for all other PATH activity classes. Implements: - A uniform navigation bar that is launched by swiping from the left - Support for specifying which BaseToolbar to use

    This activity requires that the base view for any child activity be DrawerLayout Make sure include the navigation view as the last element in the activity's root DrawerLayout like this:

    Created by Jason Rogena - jrogena@ona.io on 16/02/2017.
